nodes.text: A Mother's Memoirs, Continued is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on April 29, 2004 and took the form of the second part of Mother Dariana's memoirs. Among other remarks, she recorded an encounter she has as a young Tarasin with a Human woman in the jungles.
